heading: Today
text: Scattered showers of rain or light wintry mix north, changing to rain showers after noon.

heading: Tonight
text: Scattered early showers north; chance of snow showers late.

heading: Saturday
text: Decreasing clouds. Chance of a mountain flurry north.
temperature: Low to mid 30s north, upper 30s to mid 40s south

heading: Sunday
text: Chance of snow showers, mainly after noon.
temperature: Mid 30s to lower 40s, some lower 30s northeast
